meta.name: Remote IOT Sensor monitoring via MQTT and InfluxDB

name: Remote IOT Sensor monitoring via MQTT and InfluxDB

parameters.content: MQTT trigger subscribed to a topic called wokwi-weather via a Mosquitto MQTT broker. The trigger receives the temperature and humidity payloads from a DHT22 sensor connected to a remote ESP32 microcontroller
Javascript code to extract the temperature and humidity values to ensure correct JSON format for the database
HTTP request node posts temperature and humidity data from the DHT22 sensor to the InfluxDB data bucket running on a local host http://localhost:8086

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.value: Token  <API Token value generated in InfluxDB>
